title: Reinforcement Learning-Based Patient-Centered Treatment Planning Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Project solving real-world treatment planning problems using mathematical modeling and reinforcement learning concepts in a smartphone-based limited technological environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain the fundamental principles of reinforcement learning through mathematical modeling and apply them to treatment planning problems.
Learners can build patient data simulation models using smartphone-based tools in limited-technology environments.
Learners can design and evaluate dynamic treatment planning algorithms considering patient privacy protection in team-based PBL environments.

resources: Simple calculator for basic statistical computations
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
